title: How to Make Wine by the Bottle

steps.headline: Mix all the ingredients (list below) except the yeast.
Allow to stand for 24 hours, then add yeast.
Allow to ferment in an open container for 5 days covered with a plastic trash bag to keep the dust out.
Syphon into a one gallon jug and place under airlock for 1 month.
steps.description: You should notice the wine beginning to clear by now.

steps.headline: Syphon off the lees into a clean jug and allow to set until clear.

text: Mix all the ingredients (list below) except the yeast.  Allow to stand for 24 hours, then add yeast.  Allow to ferment in an open container for 5 days covered with a plastic trash bag to keep the dust out.  Syphon into a one gallon jug and place under airlock for 1 month. You should notice the wine beginning to clear by now. Syphon off the lees into a clean jug and allow to set until clear.
